Name: Kastle Krush
About the game: Kastle Krush is a strategy game in a fantasy world. You can build castle and defeat your opponent. Build your castle, use unique units and spells - find the best way to win. Enjoy yourself in the colorful world with pigs and horses. Key Features: Various buildings for build in your castle Use spells to attack and defense Huge scale battles, which include hundreds of units on each side Network play: play with friends or with random players Play vs AI: there are three levels of difficulty
